skillDetails.name: Fiery Glands
skillDetails.description: For every shield applied there is a 3% chance to apply Burn (Debuff) on a random enemy. This Monster can apply an additional stack of Burn.

monstersWithSkill.skillDescription: For every shield applied there is a 3% chance to apply Burn (Debuff) on a random enemy. This Monster can apply an additional stack of Burn.
